changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE person ( id BIGINT GENERATED BY DEFAULT AS IDENTITY NOT NULL, created_date TIMESTAMP WITHOUT TIME ZONE, created_by VARCHAR(255), last_modified_date TIMESTAMP WITHOUT TIME ZONE, last_modified_by VARCHAR(255), active BOOLEAN NOT NULL, contact_point JSONB, address JSONB, gender JSONB, identifier JSONB, deceased BOOLEAN, deceased_date_time TIMESTAMP WITHOUT TIME ZONE, marital_status JSONB, employment_status JSONB, education JSONB, organization JSONB, contact JSONB, date_of_birth date NOT NULL, date_of_registration date NOT NULL, archived INTEGER, facility_id BIGINT, uuid VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, first_name VARCHAR(255), surname VARCHAR(255), other_name VARCHAR(255), is_date_of_birth_estimated BOOLEAN, CONSTRAINT pk_person PRIMARY KEY (id) ); ALTER TABLE person ADD CONSTRAINT uc_person_uuid UNIQUE (uuid);
